  "summary": "This feature implements a real-time analytics dashboard that aggregates IoT events, ranks top events, and detects anomalies. It provides analytical insights through summary and trend endpoints to help users understand event patterns and identify unusual activity.",

  "implementation_steps": [
    "Create analytics data models and schemas for events, aggregations, and anomalies",
    "Implement event aggregation engine with time-based grouping (hourly, daily, weekly)",
    "Build ranking system to identify and score top events by frequency/severity",
    "Develop anomaly detection using statistical methods (z-score, isolation forest)",
    "Create trend analysis module for pattern recognition and forecasting",
    "Implement real-time data streaming pipeline with WebSocket support",
    "Build API endpoints for analytics summary and trends with pagination",
    "Create caching layer using Redis for performance optimization",
    "Develop dashboard components for visualization and alerts",
    "Add comprehensive testing for analytics algorithms and API endpoints",
    "Implement monitoring and logging for analytics performance",
    "Create documentation for analytics metrics and API usage"
  ]
